TopicTitle: [WIP] HyperBeast6 Destroyer with stock made radial separators, sepratron and controllable missiles

Articles.Content:
Hello Fellow Kebonauts!

The hyper beast6 is a destroyer with 6 sepratron kinetic shells, 6 bi-bombs,and one Mammoth Orbital Missile, all connected to the main craft body via specifically created stock radial separators.

There are 10 shots in total, 3 double firing(for stability) bi-bombs,6 sepratron kinetic shells, and one mun shattering Mammoth Orbital Missile.

Each of these missiles are connected by radial separators, which completely separates the two ends and discards the separator.

This spaceplane is able to reach orbit with enough fuel and also dock safely.

Both the Bi-bombs and Mammoth Orbital Missile are able to be controlled by clicking [ to cycle through available shells.

Usage: 

Click key 1-3 = Double Bi Bomb Drop.

Click key 4-9 = sepratron kinetic shells.

Click key 0 = Mammoth Orbital Missile (The Main Hyper Beast ship will probably explode at this point ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

I recommend playing with unbreakable joints, infinite fuel and ignore max temperature for the best results.

Download Link: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/4zequnzc0xka7xe/HyperBeast6.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/4zequnzc0xka7xe/HyperBeast6.craft?dl=0) (No pictures because graphics card sucks too hard)

\*This is a work in slow progress, as my computer specs sucks too much for me to do extensive testing, so if anyone would like to modify this ship or use parts of it, then absolutely go ahead, and please share your work in this thread.

My next project, HyperBeast 4, shall be a Hyper Beast Chassis modified to include an orbital rail gun with reloadable ammo clips via docking, stay tuned!
